topic.title: DITA Map to PDF - XSL-FO Customization

body.p: comes bundled with the DITA Open Toolkit that provides a mechanism for converting DITA maps to PDF output. includes a built-in DITA Map to PDF - XSL-FO transformation scenario that convert DITA maps to PDF using an xsl:fo processor.

DITA to PDF output can be customized in several ways:
Creating a customization directory and using it from the PDF transformation scenario.
Creating a DITA Open Toolkit plugin that adds extensions to the PDF output. More details can be found in the DITA Open Toolkit Documentation.Some sample plugins are available on GitHub that could help you to get started with creating a plugin:
Sample Plugin: DITA-OT PDF Customization Plugin for Oxygen User Manual
Sample Plugin: DITA-OT PDF2 - Generate Numbers Before Topic's Title
